name: Customer Authentication Architecture
description: Architecture containing a customer authentication service that validates user credentials and manages session tokens

nodes.name: End User
nodes.description: Customer or end user who authenticates with the system to access protected resources

nodes.name: Customer Authentication System
nodes.description: Complete authentication system providing secure user credential validation and session management capabilities

nodes.name: Customer Authentication Service
nodes.description: A service responsible for validating user credentials, managing user sessions, and generating secure session tokens for authenticated users

nodes.name: Customer Authentication Database
nodes.description: Primary database storing user credentials, session tokens, and authentication-related data for the customer authentication service

relationships.description: End user interacts with customer authentication service to login and manage sessions
Customer authentication system is composed of the authentication service and database
Customer authentication service connects to database for storing and retrieving user data
